description:
Tough and affordable pedals that are great for new riders, new builds, or just replacing a pedal that kissed rock. Composite construction keeps the Attack pedals weight low, without sacrificing strength. The large platform design makes it easy to find your perfect pedalling position and adjust on the fly.

  • Sealed cartridge and bearing for an easy spin
  • Big 113 x 114mm platform for efficient power transfer
  • Nylon composite is light and strong
  • 10 replaceable pins per side
name: MEC Attack Pedals
